name: AUBHAlexaSkillforCanvas
0:
”Alexa, open American University of Bahrain.”
”Alexa, ask American University of Bahrain for announcements.”
”what are my grades”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: american university of bahrain
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can directly access course information from your Canvas account with Alexa—without ever having to open Canvas.

-First you need to link your AUBH account to use the skill.

-Use the Canvas Skill to ask Alexa questions:

To Invoke the skill say, "Alexa open American University of Bahrain"

“What are my grades?”
“Do I have any announcements?”
“Do I have any assignments?”

Or , simply say...

"Alexa ask American University of Bahrain for assignments"/grades/announcements.
